posts.post_content:
This could have taken Rafiq's spot in From the Vault: Legends. Except that I have no recollection of his importance as a character in stories.  
  
I haven't finished the Great Weatherlight Saga, but still, I know most of the Crew and a bunch of highlights so if I haven't seen his name then he might just have not been very important. :/  
  
Then again, as a story character I have no clue about anything to do with Visara the Dreadful either, I just know she's great to kill people with. Actually why the ruddy blinking stinking bleeding flying nine hells didn't Phage the Untouchable get Visara's place? o.O   
  
Now that I just think of it....seems insane. Cuz she's like what you expect from Mythic Rare Legendaries now: Crucial to the story AND just happens to totally kick your ass too.  
  
Well, hopefully Commander's Toolbox will see some of these given the reprints they deserve. There are actually not an infinite plethora of extraordinary Legends from before Mirrodin Block, so you'd think all of them... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
